author: forthommel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the build of CepGen release >= 1.2.2 where the include chain was strongly modified. This will cure [the recent build failure](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9308#issuecomment-2240999981) encountered in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9308.

#### PR validation:

Builds

Backport of #44647 

FYI: @smuzaffar, @bbilin
title: [12_4_X] CepGenInterface: Added missing include
